metadata.title: CVE-2022-3050 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in WebUI in Google Chrome on Chrome OS prior to105.0.5195.52 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage inspecific UI interactions to potentially exploit heap corruption via craftedUI interactions.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
